xmlText.p: COMMISSIONER'S OFFICE — Suspended Cincinnati RHP Jake Ehret (Louisville-IL) 50 games and Cleveland OF Carlos Ventura (DSL Indians) 72 games for violations of the Minor League Drug Prevention and Treatment Program.<
BALTIMORE ORIOLES — Placed LHP Zach Britton on the 60-day DL.
TEXAS RANGERS — Agreed to terms with RHP Edinson Volquez on a minor league contract.<
CHICAGO CUBS — Agreed to terms with RHP Shae Simmons on a one-year contract. Placed LHP Drew Smyly on the 60-da DL.
MILWAUKEE BREWERS — Agreed to terms with SS Nick Franklin and LHP Wade Miley on minor league contracts.
PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES — Agreed to terms with RHP Drew Hutchison on a minor league contract.<
SUSSEX COUNTY MINERS — Released C JJ Fernandez.<
DELAWARE 87ERS — Acquired G Kyle Randall from the available player pool.<
CAROLINA PANTHERS — Reinstated general manager Marty Hurney.<
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Signed DE Craig Roh to a two-year contract.<
DALLAS STARS — Recalled F Jason Dickinson from Texas (AHL).
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Placed F John Quenneville on injured reserve, retroactive to Feb. 10.
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned F Vinni Lettieri to Hartford (AHL).<
ONTARIO REIGN — Recalled RW Spencer Watson from Manchester (ECHL).<
AHL — Suspended Worcester G Eamon McAdam two games.<
ATLANTA UNITED — Traded the discovery rights to M Alejandro Romero Gamarra to the N.Y. Red Bulls for general allocation money.
D.C. UNITED — Signed D Chris Odoi-Atsem to a one-year contract.<
CHATTANOOGA — Named Jeremiah Wilson cornerbacks coach.
DUKE — Promoted Ben Albert and Matt Guerrieri to co-defensive coordinators. Named Lanier Goethie assistant football coach.
LA SALLE — Announced the resignation of field hockey coach Michelle Marks Salmi.
MEMPHIS — Named Scott Symons inside linebackers coach.
MICHIGAN STATE — Signed football coach Mark Dantonio to a one-year contract extension through the 2023 season.
